reviews.review: good
Un juego maravilloso, ingenioso y gracioso. Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado.

Я знаю, что сейчас мало часов наигранно, но игру я уже прошёл на пиратке (купил ради кооп режима). Но если в двех словах - отличная игра! Это смесь пространственная головоломки, смешного юмора и интересного, но простого для понимания, сюжета. Головоломки в меру сложные, но все равно интересные, персонажы раскрыты, а юмор действительно заставит задуматься над смыслом твоей никчёмной жизни...
더 흥미로운 게임 플레이와 스토리 그리고 그만큼 퍼즐도 어려워짐

buenardo
cf

Best game I've ever played. EVER.  And I have played thousands of game, whether it would be on steam, console, or other platforms.  I have always loved puzzle games, but this one takes the cake.  Except literally.  All of Valve's games have been blessed by Jesus himself, all a masterpiece with relating stories.  This one has a great story, great game play (6 hours if you marathon it) and the puzzles are hard, but do-able with great satisfaction awaiting you at the end.  Plus it's hilarious with the dark humor, I never thought I'd enjoy being insulted.  I loved this game so much I bought it for all my friends.  I suggest you do the same

Any game with Stephen Merchant in is a 10/10 for me, movies he's in, maybe not so much, but this game. Wow. Portal 3 please (I know its not going to happen, but we can dream I suppose)?

Portal 2 is the perfect example of a sequel done right. It not only takes everything good from the first game, but also improves its problems as well. The gameplay is mostly similar but adds in plenty of new mechanics to keep it fresh. The story and characters are much more polished and thought out. The atmosphere is very similar to the first game, but you spend more time behind the scenes of Aperture Laboratories which i found really interesting. My only complaint with the first game was that I felt it was too short, but this game definitely fixes that. In general, if you liked the first portal, you'll love this game.
absolutely amazing, step up from the first portal
